HERO_DESC: Easily Track and Manage Your Assets with ShibTools, <InlineBlock>the Web3 Dashboard.</InlineBlock>
BACKGROUND_DESC: Dashboard services available today are limited to three categories: those linked to particular layer-1 chains, those created by the same development team or supported by shared VCs, and those kept as proprietary software. These limitations restrain their capacity to expand beyond their respective ecosystems.
DASHBOARD_PARA_1: ShibTools is an open-source web3 dashboard in that users can add multiple wallets and group their crypto assets into one.
DASHBOARD_PARA_2: Investing in DeFi? View not only balances but your stakes for various protocols as well.
STATUS_QUO_DESC:
Exactly. Users are entirely different from wallets,
a more extensive concept by itself.
But current web3 products treat them the same.
In the cross-chain universe, user activities and assets no longer remain in one address or chain.
